You plan to visit 5 European cities for 14 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You plan to stay in Vienna for 6 days. From day 1 to day 6, there is an annual show you want to attend in Vienna. You would like to visit Warsaw for 3 days. You want to spend 3 days in Naples. You plan to visit relatives in Naples between day 10 and day 12. You plan to stay in Paris for 3 days. You want to spend 3 days in Lyon.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Paris and Naples, Vienna and Warsaw, Naples and Warsaw, Lyon and Paris, Vienna and Lyon, Vienna and Naples, Vienna and Paris, Paris and Warsaw.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 14 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
